fxInfo_label: Representation of disadvantaged social groups binary
fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Disadvantage refers to socioeconomic disadvantage. Specifically, in order to be considered disadvantaged members of a social group must have an average income that is significantly below the median national income.
fxInfo_notes: As of December 2014, category "0" from variable v2lgdsadlo is coded separately as v2lgdsadlobin.
fxInfo_question: Are there disadvantaged groups in the society?
fxInfo_scale: Dichotomous, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2lgdsadlobin, *_osp, *_ord
